summary: Implement Twining as a Claude Code plugin with skills, hooks, agents, commands, and MCP server instructions
context: Installing Twining currently requires 3+ manual steps. The Claude Code plugin system collapses this into a single install that bundles MCP server, skills, hooks, agents, and commands. Skills teach Claude when to use Twining autonomously.
rationale: Plugin provides one-step install, behavioral teaching via skills (not just documentation), auto-starting MCP server, and lifecycle hooks. Skills are mapped to cover all 27 tools across 7 skills. MCP server instructions provide a fallback for non-Claude-Code clients.

alternatives.option: Keep manual install only with improved docs
alternatives.reason_rejected: Requires users to copy CLAUDE.md template, configure hooks, and add MCP server separately â€” high friction

alternatives.option: Ship skills as a separate npm package
alternatives.reason_rejected: Skills need to be bundled with the MCP server config to provide the one-step install experience
